title: FileNotFoundError
body:
**Your Operating system and DeepLabCut version**
Ubuntu 20.04 LTS, with an Anaconda Env, & deeplabcut 2.1.8.2 

Please complete the following information about your system:

OS: [Ubuntu 20.04 LTS,]
DeepLabCut Version: deeplabcut 2.1.8.2 
Anaconda env used:

When running testscript.py , I get the following error on 
```
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
FileNotFoundError                         Traceback (most recent call last)
~/Desktop/DeepLabCut1/DeepLabCut/examples/testscript.py in <module>
    214 
    215 print("RELABELING")
--> 216 DF = pd.read_hdf(file, "df_with_missing")
    217 DLCscorer = np.unique(DF.columns.get_level_values(0))[0]
    218 DF.columns.set_levels([scorer.replace(DLCscorer, scorer)], level=0, inplace=True)

~/anaconda3/envs/DLC-GPU/lib/python3.7/site-packages/pandas/io/pytables.py in read_hdf(path_or_buf, key, mode, errors, where, start, stop, columns, iterator, chunksize, **kwargs)
    385 
    386         if not exists:
--> 387             raise FileNotFoundError(f"File {path_or_buf} does not exist")
    388 
    389         store = HDFStore(path_or_buf, mode=mode, errors=errors, **kwargs)

```

**How to Reproduce the problem**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. conda activate DLC-GPU
2. ipython testscript.py
3. appears error







**Screenshots**
![Screenshot from 2020-08-24 11-49-30](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/68699532/91074284-ec2dc600-e601-11ea-8ed7-81d335858c23.png)




**Additional context**
 i am trying to install deeplabcut on ubutu but i have a lot of problems, also i am beginner in DeepLabCut
